thread.title: Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger fires shot at critics – and warns them to stop telling him how to run HIS club
thread.title_full: Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger fires shot at critics – and warns them to stop telling him how to run HIS club

author: jhutchinson
title: Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger fires shot at critics – and warns them to stop telling him how to run HIS club
text:
EFL BACK OFF Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger fires shot at critics – and warns them to stop telling him how to run HIS club 
Wenger says that he has become immune to the avalanche of criticism which threatens to bury everyone at the Emirates on an annual basis by MARK IRWIN
